statements: UPDATE PortfolioHoldings SET market_value = 1000, quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PortfolioHoldings SET risk_score = 3.5, market_value = 750 WHERE asset_name = 'Stock A';
UPDATE PortfolioHoldings SET quantity = 100, market_value = 50000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE PortfolioHoldings SET risk_score = 7.5, asset_name = 'Apple' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE portfolio_holdings SET quantity = 100, market_value = 1500.50 WHERE position_id = 1;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET sharpe_ratio = 1.2345, beta = 0.9876 WHERE position_id = 3;
UPDATE portfolio_holdings SET quantity = quantity + 10, market_value = market_value * 1.03 WHERE position_id = 101
UPDATE risk_metrics SET volatility = volatility * 0.95, beta = beta * 1.1 WHERE metric_id = 201
UPDATE portfolios SET name = 'New Portfolio Name' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE holdings SET quantity = 100, price = 50.25, value = 5025.00 WHERE portfolio_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE portfolios SET name = 'Aggressive Portfolio' WHERE id = '2e3c7544-19bc-4c09-ba02-d033f4aa0b8e';
UPDATE holdings SET price = 105.75, value = quantity * 105.75 WHERE asset_name = 'AAPL' AND portfolio_id = 'a3cdd7c0-2bf6-4c11-b3c6-dd9ee14f7d27';
UPDATE holdings SET quantity = 1500.75, price = 25.99 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 10:30:00', metric_value = 0.456 WHERE id = 456;
UPDATE holdings SET quantity = 1500.00, price = 25.75 WHERE id = 101
